projects.title: MEDIPREDICT: HEALTH RISK ANALYSIS
projects.description: MediPredict helps users understand their health by predicting disease risks, showing visual reports, and saving past results so users can track changes over time.

projects.title: BLOGGING PLATFORM
projects.description: A full-stack blogging platform built with React and Node.js featuring user authentication, blog creation, commenting, responsive design, and SEO optimization for enhanced visibility and scalability.

projects.title: ORGANIZATION WEBSITE
projects.description: A responsive organizational website developed using modern front-end tools, emphasizing clean UI/UX and performance optimization.

projects.title: VIDEO HUB
projects.description: Video Hub is a user-friendly video platform that combines secure authentication, video uploads, dark mode, and interactive UI elements to deliver an engaging and modern video-browsing experience.

projects.title: FOOD WEBSITE
projects.description: A food website landing that offers users a seamless experience intuitive interface.
